meanings.definition: A person or thing that deepens something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was a helpful deepener of knowledge in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The book acted as a deepener of emotions for the reader.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle was a fun deepener of the challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a deepener of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The music served as a deepener of the atmosphere at the party.

meanings.definition: A substance or technique that intensifies or enhances a particular quality or feeling.
meanings.sent1: Adding spices to the dish acted as a deepener of flavor.
meanings.sent2: The artist used light as a deepener of contrast in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The joke was a clever deepener of laughter among friends.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was a deepener of colors in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers was a deepener of nostalgia for the old days.
